description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8406f","text":"This protocol provides detailed, step-by-step instructions for students and researchers to annotate transcriptomes. In this tutorial, we will follow the Trinity -\u003e TransDecoder -\u003e Trinotate pipeline, using the SwissProt and Pfam databases for functional annotation of protein-coding transcripts.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"dpipd","text":"Ferrari RR, Batista TM, Zhou QS, Hilário HO, Orr MC, Luo A, Zhu CD. The Whole Genome of Colletes collaris (Hymenoptera: Colletidae): An Important Step in Comparative Genomics of Cellophane Bees. Genome Biol Evol. 2023 May 5;15(5):evad062. doi: 10.1093/gbe/evad062. PMID: 37075227; PMCID: PMC10159585.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working
